description:
Toshio is one of http://anidb.net/ch39363 [Hajime]`s best friends. He`s the computer genius of the group, and is a very accomplished hacker. (Don`t worry, he wouldn`t harm a fly - he only uses his skills to gather information about aliens.) He`s got something of a stubborn streak, but overall he`s very calm and aloof.
Source: shingu.rightstuf.com
name: Mikami Toshio
